snippet: The state’s top utilities regulator has been subpoenaed in a broadening criminal investigation set off by a coal ash spill that coated 70 miles of the Dan River with toxic sludge last month.
lead_paragraph: The state’s top utilities regulator has been subpoenaed in a broadening criminal investigation set off by a coal ash spill that coated 70 miles of the Dan River with toxic sludge last month.

headline.main: North Carolina: Utilities Board Chair Is Subpoenaed in Coal Ash Inquiry
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Utilities Board Chair Is Subpoenaed In Coal Ash Inquiry
